Config.ShowAccessShopInfo.Name: Enable Access Shop Menu
Config.ShowAccessShopInfo.Tooltip: Shows whether a player is currently accessing the shop.
Config.EnableModLimit.Name: Enable Mod Limit
Config.EnableKickDelayedPlayer.Name: Enable Kick Delayed Player
Config.EnableKickDelayedPlayer.Tooltip: If a player has a latency of more than 100ms for 5 consecutive seconds, the player is kicked.
Config.ShowPlayerCount.Name: Show Player Count
